expo.name: Zowni
expo.description: iOS-only app for comparing weather forecast with historical data. Expo fork at: https://github.com/brentvatne/weather-app-react-native / Original at: https://github.com/delfrrr/weather-app-react-native and on the App Store at https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/zowni/id1140299292?ls=1&mt=8
